{"id":514375875,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 days, 19 hours","timestamp":1624878264,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/514375875/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validWordAbbreviation(string word, string abbr) {\n        int i = 0, j = 0;\n        while (i < word.size() || j < abbr.size()) {\n            if (i >= word.size() || j >= abbr.size()) return false;\n            if (isalpha(abbr[j])) {\n                if (abbr[j++] != word[i++]) return false;\n                continue;\n            }\n            int num = abbr[j++] - '0';\n            if (j < abbr.size() && isdigit(abbr[j])) num = num * 10 + (abbr[j++] - '0');\n            i += num;\n        }\n        return i == word.size() && j == abbr.size();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
